entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
